channel.title: Posts on Enoch Cobbina
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Enoch Cobbina

item.title: Ubuntu Server Setup and Docker Install
item.description: Part two of the web hosting series explains setting up a web server using Ubuntu. It covers installing Ubuntu, Docker Desktop, configuring a static IP address, and testing for CGNAT.

item.title: Demystifying Domains: A Guide to Acquiring Your Own
item.description: This is the first of a series on self-hosting websites and services. It explores the concept of domains as unique internet addresses and explains how to acquire one using Cloudflare’s domain registrar services.
